plugin.name: Versions Maven Plugin
plugin.description: Versions Plugin for Maven 2. The Versions Plugin updates the versions of components in the POM.

mojo.description: Removes the initial backup of the pom, thereby accepting the changes.

Compare dependency versions of the current project to dependencies or dependency management of a remote repository project. Can optionally update locally the project instead of reporting the comparison

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: excludeReactor
parameter.description: Whether to skip processing dependencies that are produced as part of the current reactor.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if excludesList is defined.

parameter.name: excludesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: ignoreRemoteDependencies
parameter.description: Ignore the list of remote dependencies and only compare the remote dependencyManagement

parameter.name: ignoreRemoteDependencyManagement
parameter.description: Ignore the remote dependency management and only check against the actual dependencies of the remote project

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if includesList is defined.

parameter.name: includesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of includes from the command line. When specifying includes from the pom, use the includes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the include configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: processDependencies
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencies section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processDependencyManagement
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencyManagement section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processParent
parameter.description: Whether to process the parent section of the project. If not set will default to false.

parameter.name: remotePom
parameter.description: The groupId, artifactId, and version of the remote project (POM) to which we are comparing. This should be in the form 'groupId:artifactId:version'

parameter.name: reportMode
parameter.description: Display the dependency version differences on the command line, but do not update the versions in the current pom. If updateDependencies is set to 'true' this will automatically be set to false.

parameter.name: reportOutputFile
parameter.description: If the output file is set, the diff report will be written to this file.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: updateDependencies
parameter.description: Update dependency versions in the current POM.

parameter.name: updatePropertyVersions
parameter.description: Update dependency versions stored in properties

mojo.description: Generates a report of available updates for the dependencies of a project.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: comparisonMethod
parameter.description: The versioning rule to use when comparing versions. Valid values are maven, numeric which will handle long version numbers provided all components are numeric, or mercury which will use the mercury version number comparison rules.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: The output directory for the report. Note that this parameter is only evaluated if the goal is run directly from the command line. If the goal is run indirectly as part of a site generation, the output directory configured in the Maven Site Plugin is used instead.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip entire check.

mojo.description: Displays all dependencies that have newer versions available.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: logOutput
parameter.description: Controls whether the display output is logged to the console.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The character encoding to use when writing to outputFile.

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: If specified then the display output will be sent to the specified file.

parameter.name: processDependencies
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencies section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processDependencyManagement
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencyManagement section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: Whether to show additional information such as dependencies that do not need updating. Defaults to false.

mojo.description: Displays any updates of the project's parent project

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: logOutput
parameter.description: Controls whether the display output is logged to the console.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The character encoding to use when writing to outputFile.

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: If specified then the display output will be sent to the specified file.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

mojo.description: Displays all plugins that have newer versions available.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms

parameter.name: logOutput

parameter.name: outputEncoding

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: If specified then the display output will be sent to the specified file.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

mojo.description: Displays properties that are linked to artifact versions and have updates available.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: autoLinkItems
parameter.description: Whether properties linking versions should be auto-detected or not.

parameter.name: excludeProperties
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to not update.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: includeProperties
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to update.

parameter.name: logOutput
parameter.description: Controls whether the display output is logged to the console.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The character encoding to use when writing to outputFile.

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: If specified then the display output will be sent to the specified file.

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: Any restrictions that apply to specific properties.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

mojo.description: Replaces any -SNAPSHOT versions with a release version, older if necessary (if there has been a release).

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: excludeReactor
parameter.description: Whether to skip processing dependencies that are produced as part of the current reactor.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if excludesList is defined.

parameter.name: excludesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if includesList is defined.

parameter.name: includesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of includes from the command line. When specifying includes from the pom, use the includes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the include configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: processDependencies
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencies section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processDependencyManagement
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencyManagement section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processParent
parameter.description: Whether to process the parent section of the project. If not set will default to false.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

mojo.description: Attempts to resolve unlocked snapshot dependency versions to the locked timestamp versions used in the build. For example, an unlocked snapshot version like '1.0-SNAPSHOT' could be resolved to '1.0-20090128.202731-1'. If a timestamped snapshot is not available, then the version will remained unchanged. This would be the case if the dependency is only available in the local repository and not in a remote snapshot repository.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: excludeReactor
parameter.description: Whether to skip processing dependencies that are produced as part of the current reactor.

parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if excludesList is defined.

parameter.name: excludesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

mojo.description: Generates a report of available updates for the plugins of a project.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: comparisonMethod
parameter.description: The versioning rule to use when comparing versions. Valid values are maven, numeric which will handle long version numbers provided all components are numeric, or mercury which will use the mercury version number comparison rules.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: The output directory for the report. Note that this parameter is only evaluated if the goal is run directly from the command line. If the goal is run indirectly as part of a site generation, the output directory configured in the Maven Site Plugin is used instead.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip entire check.

mojo.description: Generates a report of available updates for properties of a project which are linked to the dependencies and/or plugins of a project.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: autoLinkItems
parameter.description: Whether properties linking versions should be auto-detected or not.

parameter.name: comparisonMethod
parameter.description: The versioning rule to use when comparing versions. Valid values are maven, numeric which will handle long version numbers provided all components are numeric, or mercury which will use the mercury version number comparison rules.

parameter.name: excludeProperties
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to not include in the report.

parameter.name: includeProperties
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to include in the report.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: The output directory for the report. Note that this parameter is only evaluated if the goal is run directly from the command line. If the goal is run indirectly as part of a site generation, the output directory configured in the Maven Site Plugin is used instead.

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: Any restrictions that apply to specific properties.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip entire check.

mojo.description: Attempts to resolve dependency version ranges to the specific version being used in the build. For example a version range of '[1.0, 1.2)' would be resolved to the specific version currently in use '1.1'.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: excludeProperties
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to not update even if they contain version-ranges.

parameter.name: excludeReactor
parameter.description: Whether to skip processing dependencies that are produced as part of the current reactor.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if excludesList is defined.

parameter.name: excludesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: includeProperties
parameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to update if they contain version-ranges.

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if includesList is defined.

parameter.name: includesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of includes from the command line. When specifying includes from the pom, use the includes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the include configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: processDependencies
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencies section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processDependencyManagement
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencyManagement section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processParent
parameter.description: Whether to process the parent section of the project. If not set will default to false.

parameter.name: processProperties
parameter.description: Whether to process the properties section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

mojo.description: Restores the pom from the initial backup.
Sets the current project's version and based on that change propagates that change onto any child modules as necessary.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: artifactId
parameter.description: The artifactId of the dependency/module to update.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: groupId
parameter.description: The groupId of the dependency/module to update.

parameter.name: newVersion
parameter.description: The new version number to set.

parameter.name: nextSnapshot
parameter.description: Whether to add next version number and -SNAPSHOT to the existing version. If not set will default to false.

parameter.name: oldVersion
parameter.description: The version of the dependency/module to update.

parameter.name: processDependencies
parameter.description: Whether to process the dependencies section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processParent
parameter.description: Whether to process the parent of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processPlugins
parameter.description: Whether to process the plugins section of the project. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: processProject
parameter.description: Whether to process the project version. If not set will default to true.

parameter.name: removeSnapshot
parameter.description: Whether to remove -SNAPSHOT from the existing version. If not set will default to false.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

parameter.name: updateMatchingVersions
parameter.description: Whether matching versions explicitly specified (as /project/version) in child modules should be updated.

mojo.description: Attempts to resolve unlocked snapshot dependency versions to the locked timestamp versions used in the build. For example, an unlocked snapshot version like '1.0-SNAPSHOT' could be resolved to '1.0-20090128.202731-1'. If a timestamped snapshot is not available, then the version will remained unchanged. This would be the case if the dependency is only available in the local repository and not in a remote snapshot repository.

mojo.description: Scans the current projects child modules, updating the versions of any which use the current project to the version of the current project.

mojo.description: Sets a property to the latest version in a given range of associated artifacts.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: autoLinkItems
parameter.description: Whether properties linking versions should be auto-detected or not.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: newVersion
parameter.description: The new version to set the property to (can be a version range to find a version within).

parameter.name: property
parameter.description: A property to update.

parameter.name: depVersion
parameter.description: The exact version to be applied for the included dependencies

parameter.name: excludeReactor

parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: forceVersion
parameter.description: If set to true, will use whatever version is supplied without attempting to validate that such a version is obtainable from the repository chain.

parameter.description: Whether to allow the incremental version number to be changed.

parameter.name: allowMajorUpdates
parameter.description: Whether to allow the major version number to be changed.

parameter.name: allowMinorUpdates
parameter.description: Whether to allow the minor version number to be changed.

parameter.description: Whether to process the parent section of the project. If not set will default to false.

parameter.name: rulesUri
parameter.description: The Wagon URI of a ruleSet file containing the rules that control how to compare version numbers.

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: settings.xml's server id for the URL. This is used when wagon needs extra authentication information.

mojo.description: Replaces any release versions with the latest snapshot version (if it has been deployed).

parameter.name: allowIncrementalUpdates
parameter.description: Whether to allow the incremental version number to be changed.

parameter.name: allowMajorUpdates
parameter.description: Whether to allow the major version number to be changed.

parameter.name: allowMinorUpdates
parameter.description: Whether to allow the minor version number to be changed.

parameter.name: allowSnapshots
parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

parameter.name: excludeReactor
parameter.description: Whether to skip processing dependencies that are produced as part of the current reactor.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if excludesList is defined.

parameter.name: excludesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to exclude. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: generateBackupPoms
parameter.description: Controls whether a backup pom should be created (default is true).

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: A list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. This configuration setting is ignored if includesList is defined.

parameter.name: includesList
parameter.description: A comma separated list of artifact patterns to include. Follows the pattern 'groupId:artifactId:type:classifier:version'. Designed to allow specifing the set of includes from the command line. When specifying includes from the pom, use the includes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the include configuration is ignored.

mojo.description: Replaces any -SNAPSHOT versions with the corresponding release version (if it has been released).

parameter.description: Whether to check for releases within the range.

parameter.description: Whether to allow snapshots when searching for the latest version of an artifact.

Designed to allow specifing the set of excludes from the command line. When specifying excludes from the pom, use the excludes configuration instead. If this property is specified then the exclude configuration is ignored.

parameter.name: failIfNotReplaced
parameter.description: Whether to fail if a SNAPSHOT could not be replaced
